name: Ori
dexEntry: A small feline predator that scratches everything with his claws, but can purr to calm friends.

moves.name: Calm Purr
moves.description: Once per turn, you may prevent all damage to this Pokémon. This power is disabled if your opponent has a Supporter in play.

moves.name: Clawed Stride
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
